title: Data Race between Serve() and Shutdown()
body:
## Problem statement

Between the functions `Serve()` and  `Shutdown()` is a data race on the variable `servers`. This occurs because the goroutine that starts the server writes into `servers` on [this line](https://github.com/amuttsch/goswagger-race/blob/master/restapi/server.go#L190). Before it starts a goroutine to handle shutdowns [here](https://github.com/amuttsch/goswagger-race/blob/master/restapi/server.go#L178). In the `handleShutdown()` method `servers` is accessed again which causes a data race:

```
==================
WARNING: DATA RACE
Read at 0x00c0000ac180 by goroutine 27:
  goswagger-race/restapi.(*Server).handleShutdown()
      .../goswagger-race/restapi/server.go:418 +0xba

Previous write at 0x00c0000ac180 by main goroutine:
  goswagger-race/restapi.(*Server).Serve()
      .../goswagger-race/restapi/server.go:220 +0x1b5a
  main.main()
      .../goswagger-race/cmd/example-server/main.go:60 +0x64a

Goroutine 27 (running) created at:
  goswagger-race/restapi.(*Server).Serve()
      .../goswagger-race/restapi/server.go:178 +0x26e
  main.main()
      .../goswagger-race/cmd/example-server/main.go:60 +0x64a
==================
==================
WARNING: DATA RACE
Read at 0x00c0004ce010 by goroutine 27:
  goswagger-race/restapi.(*Server).handleShutdown()
      .../goswagger-race/restapi/server.go:425 +0x1a6

Previous write at 0x00c0004ce010 by main goroutine:
  goswagger-race/restapi.(*Server).Serve()
      .../goswagger-race/restapi/server.go:220 +0x1b20
  main.main()
      .../goswagger-race/cmd/example-server/main.go:60 +0x64a

Goroutine 27 (running) created at:
  goswagger-race/restapi.(*Server).Serve()
      .../goswagger-race/restapi/server.go:178 +0x26e
  main.main()
      .../goswagger-race/cmd/example-server/main.go:60 +0x64a
==================
```

## Swagger specification

https://github.com/amuttsch/goswagger-race/blob/master/swagger.yaml

## Steps to reproduce

To reproduce clone my repo https://github.com/amuttsch/goswagger-race , run `go run -race cmd/example-server/main.go` and wait a few seconds.

## Environment
swagger version: 0.19.0
go version: 1.12
OS: Linux

Related to #1781
